definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
tired/weary/to strain/to wear out/to work hard
to accumulate/to involve or implicate (Taiwan pr. [lei4])/continuous/repeated
see 是騾子是馬，牽出來遛遛|是骡子是马，牵出来遛遛[shi4 luo2 zi5 shi4 ma3 , qian1 chu1 lai5 liu4 liu5]
pinyin: shi4 luo2 zi5 shi4 ma3 , la1 chu1 lai5 liu4 liu5
containing_words.word: 是骡子是马，拉出来遛遛

definition: lit. to see whether it's a mule or a horse, take it out for a walk (idiom)/fig. the proof of the pudding is in the eating/to show what one is made of
pinyin: shi4 luo2 zi5 shi4 ma3 , qian1 chu1 lai5 liu4 liu5
containing_words.word: 是骡子是马，牵出来遛遛

sentences.english: He brought many goats, mules, chickens and sheep.
sentences.chinese: 于是他买了很多羊，骡，鸡和绵羊。

sentences.english: Actually I meant to notify you beforehand.
sentences.chinese: 骡罣实际上我是想事先通知你的。

sentences.english: Cross Creek and the South East Palace is a white mule mound sites.
sentences.chinese: 宫东跨溪而南是白骡冢遗址。

sentences.english: I have one mule and just a few sheep.
sentences.chinese: 我有一头骡，少数几只羊。

sentences.english: We regret we are unable to accept your proposal.
sentences.chinese: 骡罣很遗憾我们不能接受贵方的建议。

sentences.english: A mule-drawn cart rumbled down the rough street.
sentences.chinese: 一辆骡车轱辘轱辘地走过高低不平的车道。

sentences.english: He carried his goods on the backs on mules. He reached the center of Santa Fe in November.
sentences.chinese: 他将货物放在骡背上，他于当年11月到达了圣达菲。

sentences.english: The mule partakes of both the horse and the ass.
sentences.chinese: 骡兼有马和驴子的特性。

definition: load carried by a pack animal
